hackathon-eligibility: You must be a student at the University of Reading. Please bring your campus card, just in case we need to check!
hackathon-requirements: Please submit as much as possible (GitHub / code, website if you have one, slide deck, etc.) to help us with judging :-)
hackathon-rules:
Maximum team size of 3. Make everything for your hack at the event - you're welcome to use resources from the internet, you shouldn't come having pre-written your code though! At all of our events, you must follow the 
.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Raspberry Pi zero, 32GB MicroSD card, "backpack" with 4 USB ports, case which neatly contains these, and mini HDMI to HDMI adaptor. A pocket linux computer!

hackathon-description-header: Get a taste of hackathons for RUSU's Give It A Go week!
